[Page Title: Home | Costa Charleston]

top of page Big, Unexpected Flavors From Around The World Encompassing coastal Italian fare from Liguria to Amalfi and down to Sicily, you can expect to share and savor handmade Italian pasta, the freshest seafood, classic beef dishes, and other culinary odes to the Mediterranean. Encapsulating the convivial spirit of Italy, Costa* is a space where culinary artistry converges with the joy of companionship. ​ Our culinary expertise extends across our Charleston properties, Zero George, Wild Common, Alcove Market, and Cannon Green, where each team brings a distinctive approach to flavor, presentation, and hospitality. VIEW OUR MENU Fresh and Seasonal Ingredients At Costa*, we believe in using only the freshest and highest quality ingredients to create our dishes and specialty cocktails. Our menu is constantly evolving to showcase the best of what each season has to offer including a daily rotating raw menu and beverages comprised of curated Italian aperitivi and digestivi, all carefully designed to transport you to the Mediterranean shores. [Page Title: Private Dining | Costa Charleston]

top of page Costa* provides a range of private dining and special event options, nestled in the charming Harleston Village neighborhood of Downtown Charleston. The Loft offers an intimate setting for up to 20 guests, featuring a cozy nautical ambiance, while the entire venue can accommodate up to 100 guests. At Costa*, we offer a curated dining journey through the Italian coast, infused with global and seasonal influences. Your dining experience will be presented in a four-course, shared format featuring a diverse selection of dishes from our menu, expertly curated by our team for your evening. Our experienced management and culinary teams will handle every detail, allowing you to relax and enjoy your celebration.
